name: [LD41] Z for Zentipede
description:
LudumDdare 41:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/z-for-zentipede

A true gamer on the hunt for an arcade highscore can’t be stopped by zombies, can he?

Controls: Arcade:
  • WASD 
  • Space
FPS:
  • Mouselook
  • Left Mouse Button Fire
  • Right Mouse button Melee
  • Mousewheel Fire Mode
Quick Centipede Reminder:

Don’t let any Centipedes & Shroom-Spawner reach the bottom of the Screen!

Gain points for:
  • Mushroom: 1
  • Centipede-Body: 10
  • Shroom-Spawner: 50
  • Centipede-Head: 100
  • Stage Cleared: 250
Credits:

Neobird Team
http://www.neobird.de
